name: WS Analytics
author: WebShouters

sections.description:
This analytics plugin enables you to track your website without modifying any files. Output your Google Analytics tracking code to your visitor everywhere on your website.

Follow Us

Website | Twitter | Facebook | Google+

If you want more information about this plugin or another one don’t doubt to visit our website:

https://www.webshouters.com/

Feedback / Review

Please take the time to rate this plugin, let me and others to know about your experiences by leaving a review, with your help I can improve the plugin for you and other users. Add Review here

Donation

If you like the plugin please Donate here.

Technical Support

If any problem occurs, please contact us at support@webshouters.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ws-analytics folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to ‘Tools’ -> ‘Analytics’ in WordPress.
  4. Now checked is active checkbox.
  5. Add your Google Analytics tracking code here.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the entire ws-analytics folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to ‘Tools’ -> ‘Analytics’ in WordPress.
  4. Now checked is active checkbox.
  5. Add your Google Analytics tracking code here.
